meanings.definition: A device that measures high temperatures.
meanings.sent1: The pyrostat showed the temperature of the oven.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to check the pyrostat before starting the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The curious cat mistook the pyrostat for a toy.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like a pyrostat, always accurate and reliable.
meanings.sent5: The glowing numbers on the pyrostat made it easy to read the temperature.

meanings.sent2: The technician adjusted the pyrostat to regulate the temperature.
meanings.sent3: The pyrostat and the regular thermostat had a heated argument.

meanings.sent5: The precision of the pyrostat ensured the safety of the equipment.
